casebody.data:
Robert J. TRIFFIN, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
MID POINT RECYCLING, LLC, a/k/a Mid Past Recycling, a/k/a Nu Way Recycling, Allen E. Hairston, II, Julian Porter and R. Vincent Bove, Defendants,
and
TD Bank, N.A., Garnishee-Respondent. C-984 September Term 2016
079104 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 20, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004370-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
